list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: add background correction for polarization images

list.name: save the config file in the output folder; add save_fig option in the config file

task.summary: Add support for 4-frames Stokes. Subtract black level for all imported tiff. Add the switch for local intensity normalization.
replace old ParseTiffInput.py with more general parse_tiff_input.py to parse micromanager channel names
update "CompositeImg" to take input with > 3 channels
update 'parse_tiff_input' to fix the pol channel order issue when run on Linux system
add support to output new microDL format
Add 561 and 637 as recognizable channel names for red and far-red channels
add support for background correction using local defocused background
add command line interface and move processing parameters to the config file
disable phase experimenting block; non-linear contrast adjustment for R+O image
export output images in separate position folders
save the config file in the output folder; add save_fig option in the config file
save the config file in the output folder; add save_fig option in the config file
added stokes images to output channels
make img_io naming consistent; get output channels from img_io
add background correction for polarization images
